name: checkbox
docstring: Selects a single value, typically for submission in a form.

properties.name: as_child
properties.docstring: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.docstring: Whether to render the checkbox with higher contrast color against background

properties.name: default_checked
properties.docstring: Whether the checkbox is checked by default

properties.name: name
properties.docstring: The name of the checkbox control when submitting the form.

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The value of the checkbox control when submitting the form.

events.name: on_change
events.docstring: Fired when the checkbox is checked or unchecked.
